plot outline: Kundanapu Bomma is a romantic comedy set in the backdrop of Vijayanagarm. Suchi (Chandini Chowdary) a happy go lucky girl falls in love with Vasu who comes to her village as a mechanic engineer. But her father is hell-bent on marrying his daughter off to her brother in law Gopi. Twist in the tale arises when Gopi who initially refuses, agrees to marry her leaving Suchi and Vasu in a shock.
title: Kundanapu Bomma
plot: A girl falls in love with a mechanic who comes to her village. Her father wants her to get married to someone else. Initially he refuses, but later he agrees to marry her. What will happen to the girl's love affair?

_Kundanapu Bomma_ (qv) is a romantic comedy set in the backdrop of Vijayanagarm. Suchi (Chandini Chowdary) a happy go lucky girl falls in love with Vasu who comes to her village as a mechanic engineer. But her father is hell-bent on marrying his daughter off to her brother in law Gopi. Twist in the tale arises when Gopi who initially refuses, agrees to marry her leaving Suchi and Vasu in a shock.
